description: There's a big house party over at Connor Maguire's pad and the guys are all having a great time partying up. As the phone rings, Connor answers to his bitchy neighbor, Austin Chandler, who is always complaining about the noise. Irritated, Connor tells him to fuck off and resumes to entertain his guests. When Austin has had enough, he marches over, banging on the door to give Connor a piece of his mind. As the bitchy neighbor confronts the party goers, he spits in their faces out of anger. The crowd doesn't take too kindly to that, and they tackle him down to the ground. Kicking and screaming Austin tries to scream for help as the guys tear away his clothes and gag him with his own underwear before passing him around for everyone's pleasure. Connor orders the guys to shut Austin up with their cocks as Connor fucks him from behind. The guys run a train on Austin before Connor ties him to the stairs and flogs him for all the party goers. When the feisty neighbor spits back in their faces again, the guys tie him up in the doorway, standing on one leg as everyone takes turns fucking his ass into submission. They finish Austin off with a bukkake to the face before dragging him off to the bathroom for more punishment.
title: Connor Maguire's House Party
